content.question: Which of the following best explains the continuity in the trade routes between East Africa, the Arabian Peninsula, and India as shown on the maps?

choices.label: Trade along the routes depended on the activities of Chinese merchants.
Trade along the routes relied on sailors’ knowledge of the monsoon winds.
Trade along the routes depended on silver from the Americas.
Trade along the routes relied on sailors’ knowledge of longitude from classical maps.

content.answer: Trade along the routes relied on sailors’ knowledge of the monsoon winds.

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
